name: Dreams Of The End - Prelude
description:
Dreams Of The End - Prelude is an experimental dive into a surreal, hand painted dreamscape.

Adventure beyond the wall of sleep into a strange world of beauty and horror. Experience out of the box gameplay ideas. If you look closely, you might just stumble across things you weren't supposed to find.

Dreams Of The End - Prelude is a short game set before the events of Dreams Of The End. It serves as something similar to a demo. Introducing the player to themes, mechanics and ideas present in the final game. The story will follow on directly from the prelude. The prelude is not required to understand the story of the final game. If anything playing the prelude will leave you with more questions.

Thanks for reading.
